LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.RoomCheckInterval: Check Private Room Interval.(affects the perfomance)
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.DuplicateMessageTooltip: Don't show duplicate waring message of CustomLayerDictionary.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.HatsOnlyOnMap: Hats shown only on game map.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.HatsOnlyOnMapTooltip: The hat is hidden in portraits. \nWhen using HAR, please use this instead of the vanilla setting.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.LayerUpdateTickTooltip: Check layers at intervals of the set in-game time.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.ResolveGraphicsModeTooltip:
Select the graphics resolve mode. Select Normal if you got no problem. 
Normal:Basic processing.
AlwaysAll:Always execute ResolveAllGraphics function. Perhaps the conflict with some mods will be resolved.
AlwaysApparel:Always execute ResolveApparelGraphics function. Perhaps the conflict with some mods will be resolved.
Legacy:Works with ver20210324. Some features will not be available, but some conflicts with MODs may be resolved. 
Legacy2:Works with ver20210324 and only fix for GaramRace some compat. Some features will not be available, but some conflicts with MODs may be resolved.
LanguageData.TOC.usePresetTooltip: Create presets for settings, filter by race or traits for automatic settings.
LanguageData.TOC.presetInfomation:
Create personalized presets.
You can select a preset from the Pawn tab window.
If you have set a filter, it will automatically be set to the Pawn that matches the filters.
Filters logic are processed from top to bottom. (Example: From the top "And A,Or B,And C,Not D" is processed as "(((A or B) And C) Nand D)").
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.DiscardTooltip: Discard personal settings and copy the common settings the next time you enable to "Use personal settings".
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.useTakeOffDrafted: Use take off to drafted pawns.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.ShowLayerDiscriptionToolti: Choose a layer. Underwear is some MOD compatible.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.useTempTooltip: Change the displayed layer according to the ambient temperature.\nFor indoor settings, lighter clothing is preferred when it is hot and thicker clothing is preferred when it is cold.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.HotTemp: The temperature for which setting is used.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.HotTempTooltip: If the ambient temperature exceeds this value, the setting will be used.\nIt has priority over cold temperatures.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.ColdTemp: The temperature for which setting is used.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.ColdTempTooltip: If the ambient temperature falls below this value, the setting will be used.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.useHatsAs: Deal hats on a specific layer.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.useHatsAsTooltip: Choose a layer of hats. Other setting of hats is given priority to.
LanguageData.TakeOffIndoor.dontBeNakedTooltip: Show at least one garment. The Torso has priority.
